MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And what?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You look rather serious.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It doesn't have anything to do with you.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm sure Kud is aware of that as well.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I didn't do anything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ただ、もし辿りつくことができたら、その時は教えて下さい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But I'd like you to let me know if you two ever reach there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But I'd like you to let me know if you two ever reach there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れから寂しそうに微笑んで、西園さんは立ち去ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: With a lonely smile, she walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a lonely smile, she walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうしたよ、理樹？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's the matter, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's the matter, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…なんだ、真人か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Oh, it's just you, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Oh, it's just you, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだ、とはひどいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's quite a greeting to give me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's quite a greeting to give me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はため息をつく。
MESSAGE.EN: I let out a sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let out a sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「クー公のことか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Little Kuu's on your mind, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Little Kuu's on your mind, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…救助活動がほとんど進んでないらしいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Seems like the rescue work isn't going well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Seems like the rescue work isn't going well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「危険な情勢みたいだが…帰ることも残ることも選びづれえな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's pretty dangerous over there... Must be tough for her to decide whether to go back or not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's pretty dangerous over there... Must be tough for her to decide whether to go back or not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…クドも迷ってるみたいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah, looks like she still can't decide.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah, looks like she still can't decide.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人は、どっちがいいと思う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, what do you think she should do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, what do you think she should do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…オレには何も言えねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...I can't say anything about that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...I can't say anything about that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「それはクー公の問題だし…何よりおまえの問題でもある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Because that's her problem... and more importantly yours, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Because that's her problem... and more importantly yours, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「だから何も言えねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So it's not my place to say anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So it's not my place to say anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえがしたいこと…願う方でいいと思うぞ…オレは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Choose what you want... choose what you wish for... that's my opinion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Choose what you want... choose what you wish for... that's my opinion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「難しいことはよくわかんねぇが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm not good with the difficult stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm not good with the difficult stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレは、そう思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But that's how I think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But that's how I think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…もう少し考えてみるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... I'll think about it a little longer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... I'll think about it a little longer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あぁ。よく考えろよ。考えられるのがおまえの特技だからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah, give it some serious thought. That's what you're good at.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah, give it some serious thought. That's what you're good at.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人は手を挙げると、去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He lifted his hand in a wave and walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: He lifted his hand in a wave and walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: は意を決した。
MESSAGE.EN: I made up my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made up my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: ドに『会って話がしたい』とメールを送る。
MESSAGE.EN: I finally texted Kud: [Can we talk in person?].
MESSAGE.Translation: I finally texted Kud: [Can we talk in person?].

MESSAGE.JP: ール送信のアニメーションが終わると、僕は画面を見たまま待った。
MESSAGE.EN: After the ❛sending...❜ animation finished, I awaited her reply with my phone open.
MESSAGE.Translation: After the ❛sending...❜ animation finished, I awaited her reply with my phone open.

MESSAGE.JP: 信音。
MESSAGE.EN: The ringtone sounded.
MESSAGE.Translation: The ringtone sounded.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（『いえす』の三文字…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Just one word: [Yes]...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Just one word: [Yes]...)

MESSAGE.JP: は、家庭科部室へ向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I headed over to the clubroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I headed over to the clubroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 人きりで話せる場所といったらそこだったから。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the first place I thought of when it came to talking in private.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the first place I thought of when it came to talking in private.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: えにふけっていた僕は、クドの声で顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stopped my musing and lifted my eyes to face Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stopped my musing and lifted my eyes to face Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは憔悴していた。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed restless.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed restless.

MESSAGE.JP: ていないのか、瞳にも生気がない。
MESSAGE.EN: She must not have been sleeping well; her eyes lacked their usual liveliness.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must not have been sleeping well; her eyes lacked their usual liveliness.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん、呼び出して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry I called you down here all of a sudden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry I called you down here all of a sudden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が言うと、クドは、ふるふる、と首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私も。お話したかったです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I wanted to talk to you, too...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I wanted to talk to you, too...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは淡々と僕に言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered in a detached tone of voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered in a detached tone of voice.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…飛行機のチケット、もらったです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I received an airplane ticket.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I received an airplane ticket.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「大使館のひとです。おかあさんは、テヴアじゃ有名なひとだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝From the Tevuan Embassy. My mother is well-known over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝From the Tevuan Embassy. My mother is well-known over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「娘の私のところにも連絡があったです。安否確認をしにいくのならば、と…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So they contacted me to see if her daughter wanted to confirm her safety for herself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So they contacted me to see if her daughter wanted to confirm her safety for herself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはくしゃくしゃになった紙を握っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was holding a piece of rumpled paper in her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was holding a piece of rumpled paper in her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 文がずらずらと書かれている。
MESSAGE.EN: I could see English words written on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could see English words written on it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…どんな情勢なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...How's it going over there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...How's it going over there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…よくわかりません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I can't really tell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I can't really tell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「暴動も起こってるらしくて、大使館のひともよくわかっていない、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The embassy told me they didn't know either due to the riots.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The embassy told me they didn't know either due to the riots.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「暴動!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Riots!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Riots!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…政府の事業に反対するひとが少ないわけでもありませんでしたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Actually, there have been many people who disagreed with the government's rocket project.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Actually, there have been many people who disagreed with the government's rocket project.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…クドは、そのチケットどうするつもりなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...So, Kud, are you going to use the ticket?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...So, Kud, are you going to use the ticket?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どうしたら、いいでしょうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What should I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What should I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは俯いたまま、呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She murmured with her face down.
MESSAGE.Translation: She murmured with her face down.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どうしたら、いいでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What do you think I should do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What do you think I should do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは僕に訊いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She asked me the question.
MESSAGE.Translation: She asked me the question.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（僕はクドに…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I have to tell her that...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I have to tell her that...)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（帰るべきだ、と言おう…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(She should go...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(She should go...)

MESSAGE.JP: 、あの混乱している国へ帰るということは、危険なことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was way too dangerous to go back to her homeland, which was currently in utter chaos.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was way too dangerous to go back to her homeland, which was currently in utter chaos.

MESSAGE.JP: ドと会えなくなってしまうかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Chances were good that I wouldn't be able to meet her ever again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Chances were good that I wouldn't be able to meet her ever again.

MESSAGE.JP: つまり、クドはもう家族には会えないということでもある。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But then again, if she decided to stay here, that meant she would never be able to see her family again.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But then again, if she decided to stay here, that meant she would never be able to see her family again.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おかあさんとの約束をしました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I promised my mother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I promised my mother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ロケットが無事戻ってきたら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝When her rocket comes back safely,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝When her rocket comes back safely,❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おかえりなさいを待ってるわ、って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'd be there to say ❛welcome home❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'd be there to say ❛welcome home❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私に何も求めなかったおかあさんが、たった一つだけ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My mother has never asked anything of me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My mother has never asked anything of me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…私に、この間、頼んでくれたことなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...but just this once, she asked me to do this for her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...but just this once, she asked me to do this for her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「迎えにいかなくちゃ…私、行かなくちゃって、思うのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I know I have to go... I know I need to be there to greet her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I know I have to go... I know I need to be there to greet her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でも、私、迷っていて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But I can't make up my mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But I can't make up my mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どうしたらいいのかもわからなくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't know what I should do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I don't know what I should do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…帰ったほうがいいと、思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I think you should go back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I think you should go back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「え…でも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Eh... But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Eh... But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…帰ったら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...If I go back...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...If I go back...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは両手を握り締める。
MESSAGE.EN: She seized my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seized my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「もう、二度と…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I might not...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I might not...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは、言葉を搾り出すように言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She spoke as though squeezing the words out of her throat.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spoke as though squeezing the words out of her throat.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「二度と…リキに会えなくなるかも、しれないのに……っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I might not be able to... meet you ever again, Riki...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I might not be able to... meet you ever again, Riki...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それでも…いいんですか…いいんですか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Are you... really... really okay with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Are you... really... really okay with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキは、それでも、私に、帰れ、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Despite knowing that, you still tell me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Despite knowing that, you still tell me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「言うんですかっっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You still tell me to go back!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You still tell me to go back!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは僕の服の裾を両手で掴み、背伸びしながら叫んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She yelled at me as she gripped the hem of my jacket so tightly that the canvas was stretching.
MESSAGE.Translation: She yelled at me as she gripped the hem of my jacket so tightly that the canvas was stretching.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…そんな、簡単に、帰れ、って言うんですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...How could you... tell me to go back... so easily...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...How could you... tell me to go back... so easily...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはうなだれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She hung her head in disappointment.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hung her head in disappointment.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「違うよ、クド…そんなことを言いたいんじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, Kud... that's not what I'm trying to say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, Kud... that's not what I'm trying to say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「違わないです。ちっとも私のことなんか考えてないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, it is. You don't care about my feelings at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, it is. You don't care about my feelings at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなことないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「だったら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どうして…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Why...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Why...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「帰ったほうがいいなんて――んぅっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...would you tell me to go ba... Mmm-h!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...would you tell me to go ba... Mmm-h!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「んー！　んんぅーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hnn! Hnnn!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hnn! Hnnn!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: に抱きしめられたクドは、ぽかぽかと僕の背中を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly drawn into my arms, Kud was beating my back with her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly drawn into my arms, Kud was beating my back with her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「んー…！　ぅーんぅーっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hmm...! Ummm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hmm...! Ummm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「んぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと唇を切っていることに顔を離して気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed my lip had gotten cut a little, after I separated myself from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed my lip had gotten cut a little, after I separated myself from her.

MESSAGE.JP: 暴に唇を奪ったから、クドの八重歯に引っかかれたみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed to be from having kissed her so violently.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed to be from having kissed her so violently.

MESSAGE.JP: かな血の味。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a taste of iron in my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a taste of iron in my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よく聞いて、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Listen, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Listen, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っちかをとらなければいけない。
MESSAGE.EN: She had to choose between one or the other.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had to choose between one or the other.

MESSAGE.JP: 分の家族か、あるいは――あるいは、もう片方。
MESSAGE.EN: Her own family, or――
MESSAGE.Translation: Her own family, or――

MESSAGE.JP: の『片方』が選ぼうとしている本人に選択を促す言葉なんて、欺瞞（ぎまん）でしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: It was nothing short of hypocritical of me, who represented ❛the latter choice❜ myself, to tell her which to choose.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was nothing short of hypocritical of me, who represented ❛the latter choice❜ myself, to tell her which to choose.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも僕は言う。
MESSAGE.EN: But still, I had to say it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But still, I had to say it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの事故…災害の中での安否確認は今帰らないと多分出来ないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm almost sure... that this is the only chance you have to make sure that your family is safe, considering how devastating the accident was.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm almost sure... that this is the only chance you have to make sure that your family is safe, considering how devastating the accident was.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今それをしなかったら、クドはずっと後悔すると思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you miss this chance, I think you'll regret it for the rest of your life.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you miss this chance, I think you'll regret it for the rest of your life.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「後悔しても、やり直せないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And even if you come to regret it, you will not be able to do it over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And even if you come to regret it, you will not be able to do it over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の混乱の中では色々なものが短時間で失われてしまうことだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Many things must be lost over there every passing moment, because of that chaotic situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Many things must be lost over there every passing moment, because of that chaotic situation.

MESSAGE.JP: って確かめられるのは今しかない。
MESSAGE.EN: Therefore, she has to get there right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Therefore, she has to get there right now.

MESSAGE.JP: ないと、クドの大切な何かは永遠に取り戻すことはできないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Otherwise, I believe she may lose something important for good.
MESSAGE.Translation: Otherwise, I believe she may lose something important for good.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でも、リキ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But, Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But, Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わた、私、帰ってこられないかもしれません…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝T-there is no guarantee that I will be able to come back here...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝T-there is no guarantee that I will be able to come back here...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: れでもいいのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Am I okay with that?
MESSAGE.Translation: Am I okay with that?

MESSAGE.JP: れで僕は納得できるのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Can I really accept that?
MESSAGE.Translation: Can I really accept that?

MESSAGE.JP: も、だからこそ、僕は言わなければならなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if not, this was something I must tell her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if not, this was something I must tell her.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「せっかく…せっかく、仲良くなれたのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝We... we finally got together...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝We... we finally got together...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「想いが叶ったのに…それなのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My dream... finally came true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My dream... finally came true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「会えなくなったら、私、どうしたらいいんですか…っ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝If it turns out we cannot meet ever again, what should I do...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝If it turns out we cannot meet ever again, what should I do...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ド自身も飛んで帰りたいと思っていることだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She must be thinking about flying over as quickly as possible.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must be thinking about flying over as quickly as possible.

MESSAGE.JP: もそれを繋ぎ止めているのは僕なのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But I am the one who's holding her back.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I am the one who's holding her back.

MESSAGE.JP: ったら、天秤に乗っている片方である僕が『帰れ』と言わなくちゃいけないじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: In that case, I have to be the one to tell her to go back, so she will be able to make up her mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: In that case, I have to be the one to tell her to go back, so she will be able to make up her mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大丈夫。きっと、会えなくなることなんて、ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's gonna be okay. I'm sure we can meet again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's gonna be okay. I'm sure we can meet again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そんな、根拠も理由もないのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But there's no basis or proof for that at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But there's no basis or proof for that at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なければ作ればいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then why don't we make one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then why don't we make one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「つくる…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Make one...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Make one...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドはまた、僕の元に戻ってくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You will come back to me again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You will come back to me again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「約束してほしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I want you to promise me this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I want you to promise me this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は、クドが戻ってくるのを待ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And I will be waiting for you to come back to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And I will be waiting for you to come back to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「約束する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I promise you this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I promise you this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ほら、根拠だ。『約束』があるから、クドは戻ってこられる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Now that we both have a ❛promise,❜ you can get back here safely.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Now that we both have a ❛promise,❜ you can get back here safely.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んて『根拠のない』言葉なのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How ❛baseless,❜ the words I just said.
MESSAGE.Translation: How ❛baseless,❜ the words I just said.

MESSAGE.JP: もそんな風に言うぐらいしか思いつかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I could think of nothing better than that meager hope.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I could think of nothing better than that meager hope.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…本当ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Are you sure?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Are you sure?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん。本当だよ。これはクドの――クドにしか出来ない仕事（ミッション）なんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Absolutely. This is―― a mission that only you can undertake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Absolutely. This is―― a mission that only you can undertake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ずるいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You are being unfair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You are being unfair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキは、ずるいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki, you are so unfair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki, you are so unfair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「好きなひとが、背中を押すのなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝If my lover gives me this much support,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝If my lover gives me this much support,❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「歩かなくちゃいけないじゃないですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝what other choice have I but to walk forward?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝what other choice have I but to walk forward?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「飛ばなくちゃいけないじゃないですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'll have to to fly over there, won't I?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'll have to to fly over there, won't I?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…行かなかったら、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...If I don't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...If I don't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ダメな子じゃないですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I will be just a useless girl...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I will be just a useless girl...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろぽろとクドの瞳から涙がこぼれる。
MESSAGE.EN: Tears streamed down her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Tears streamed down her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキが…リキが、待っていてくれるのなら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝If... if you are waiting for me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝If... if you are waiting for me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…帰ることに、します…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I will go back...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I will go back...❞

MESSAGE.JP: い間のあと、クドは帰国するという決断をした。
MESSAGE.EN: After a short silence, she told me her conclusion.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a short silence, she told me her conclusion.

MESSAGE.JP: 末がやってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: The weekend had arrived.
MESSAGE.Translation: The weekend had arrived.

MESSAGE.JP: 間はなるべくクドのために使いたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had decided to spend as much of my time as I could with Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had decided to spend as much of my time as I could with Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: ドの退去を知っている寮長は、裏口から入ることを黙認してくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: The dorm head, who knew about Kud moving out, let me into the girls' dorm through the backdoor.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dorm head, who knew about Kud moving out, let me into the girls' dorm through the backdoor.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは自分の部屋の前でぼんやりと立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was standing in front of her room with an absent expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was standing in front of her room with an absent expression.

MESSAGE.JP: の姿を見つけると、うっすらと微笑む。
MESSAGE.EN: As she recognized me, she gave me a soft smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she recognized me, she gave me a soft smile.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はろー、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Haro-, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Haro-, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Come on in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Come on in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 屋にはクドしかいなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her roommate wasn't in.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her roommate wasn't in.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「気を、つかっていただいたみたいで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I have to thank her for her consideration.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I have to thank her for her consideration.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「久しぶりかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's been quite a while since I last visited here, hasn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's been quite a while since I last visited here, hasn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですね…お引っ越しのとき以来ですか、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes... It was when I had just moved in here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes... It was when I had just moved in here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とクドは並んでベッドに腰掛けた。
MESSAGE.EN: We sat down on her bed, next to each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: We sat down on her bed, next to each other.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは僕の肩に頭を寄せてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She leaned her head on my shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: She leaned her head on my shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…あの…」
理樹@「ん、なに、クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm, what is it, Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm, what is it, Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「撫でて欲しいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'd like you to stroke my hair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'd like you to stroke my hair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は黙って左手でクドの頭を抱え込んで髪の毛を撫でた。
MESSAGE.EN: I silently caressed her hair with my left arm wrapped around her shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: I silently caressed her hair with my left arm wrapped around her shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: らさらの、クドの髪。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hair really was smooth, no matter how many times I did it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hair really was smooth, no matter how many times I did it.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「気持ちいい？　クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Does it feel good, Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Does it feel good, Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 々考えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were countless thoughts swirling around in my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were countless thoughts swirling around in my head.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、今は何も言う気がしなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet in the end, I did not say anything at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet in the end, I did not say anything at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 言で、ずっと髪の毛を撫でていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I simply kept stroking her hair wordlessly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I simply kept stroking her hair wordlessly.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…すぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...*zzZzz*...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...*zzZzz*...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の毛を撫でられて安心したせいだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: My petting her hair must have been very soothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: My petting her hair must have been very soothing.

MESSAGE.JP: ドはうとうとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was dozing off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was dozing off.

MESSAGE.JP: 理もない。
MESSAGE.EN: It couldn't be helped.
MESSAGE.Translation: It couldn't be helped.

MESSAGE.JP: わってくるニュースは悪化の一途をたどっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There had been no good news coming from Tevua.
MESSAGE.Translation: There had been no good news coming from Tevua.

MESSAGE.JP: 務省からも渡航自粛勧告が出ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Also, the Foreign Ministry was still imposing a travel ban on the country.
MESSAGE.Translation: Also, the Foreign Ministry was still imposing a travel ban on the country.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…ごめんなさいなのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…ごめんなさい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ―決めたとはいえ――
MESSAGE.EN: ――Even though she had at last made her decision,――
MESSAGE.Translation: ――Even though she had at last made her decision,――

MESSAGE.JP: う、二度と、僕の『となり』に、帰れないかもしれないのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: we were both still full of anxiety that we would never be able to be by each other's side again.
MESSAGE.Translation: we were both still full of anxiety that we would never be able to be by each other's side again.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…すぅ」
ドの謝罪は誰に対してのものだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: Who was it that Kud was apologizing to, I wondered?
MESSAGE.Translation: Who was it that Kud was apologizing to, I wondered?

MESSAGE.JP: ドが謝ることではないのに。
MESSAGE.EN: She owed me no apology.
MESSAGE.Translation: She owed me no apology.

MESSAGE.JP: 不尽な、けれど自分にはどうしようもない憤りを抱えている。
MESSAGE.EN: Inside me, there was an unreasonable anger that I could do nothing about.
MESSAGE.Translation: Inside me, there was an unreasonable anger that I could do nothing about.

MESSAGE.JP: ドの顔をのぞきこむと、つ、と涙が頬を伝っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: As I turned to look at Kud's face, I saw the tears running down her cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I turned to look at Kud's face, I saw the tears running down her cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: をぎゅ、っと握る。
MESSAGE.EN: It made my hand clench into a tight fist.
MESSAGE.Translation: It made my hand clench into a tight fist.

MESSAGE.JP: が今できるのは、僕の大切な女の子のささややかな眠りを、髪の毛を撫でながら守ることだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: All I could do now was protect the little sleep of my beloved girl by gently stroking her sleek hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I could do now was protect the little sleep of my beloved girl by gently stroking her sleek hair.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「っと。これで最後か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...There. Is this the last one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...There. Is this the last one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あとは細かいものばかりで軽いですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, there're just small and light things left now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, there're just small and light things left now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ありがとうございます、井ノ原さん。お世話になりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thank you for the help, Inohara-san. I appreciate everything you've done for me so far.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thank you for the help, Inohara-san. I appreciate everything you've done for me so far.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドがぺこん、と頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She bowed her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bowed her head.

MESSAGE.JP: ラックに積まれた荷物を見て真人は言う。
MESSAGE.EN: With a glance at the luggage loaded into the truck, Masato asked her.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a glance at the luggage loaded into the truck, Masato asked her.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「学校に置いたままにしておけばいいんじゃねぇのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Can't you just leave them at the school?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Can't you just leave them at the school?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…退学申請したのですから、寮に荷物はおいておけません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I can't use the dorm room anymore, because I've already withdrawn from the school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I can't use the dorm room anymore, because I've already withdrawn from the school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「それも、そうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah, that's true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah, that's true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「では、まだ整理が残っているので…本当にありがとうございました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I still have stuff to do... Really, thank you very much for your help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I still have stuff to do... Really, thank you very much for your help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手を揃えてクドが再び頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She bowed, yet again, deeply with her hands joined together.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bowed, yet again, deeply with her hands joined together.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ、また後で」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki, I'll see you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki, I'll see you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは微笑むと、女子寮まで戻っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: With a smile, she turned back to the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a smile, she turned back to the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なぁ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「言わないでよ、真人。二人で話した結果なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't say it, Masato. This is what we both decided on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't say it, Masato. This is what we both decided on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…なら、いいけどよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Then it's okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Then it's okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「恭介、なんとかなんねぇのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Kyousuke, can't you do anything about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Kyousuke, can't you do anything about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介は無言でクドの行った先を見つめている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke was wordlessly staring in the direction Kud had gone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke was wordlessly staring in the direction Kud had gone.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「無理か。…どうせなら、最後にぱーっと送り出してやりたいところだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No good, huh... If only we could send her out with a bang, at least.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No good, huh... If only we could send her out with a bang, at least.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そういう状況じゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, it's not that kind of situation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, it's not that kind of situation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「能美もそんな気分じゃないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And I'm sure Noumi doesn't feel like it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And I'm sure Noumi doesn't feel like it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「やっぱり、何にも出来ねぇってことか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So in the end, there's nothing we can do for her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So in the end, there's nothing we can do for her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人はため息をついた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato sighed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato sighed.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「能美の感謝の言葉は荷物を運んだだけのことじゃないぞ、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You know, what she thanked you for isn't just only carrying her stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You know, what she thanked you for isn't just only carrying her stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「だったら、いいんだけどな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Would be nice if that's the case.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Would be nice if that's the case.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 闇が迫るなか、僕たちも寮へ戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: We also made our way back to the dorm under the setting sun.
MESSAGE.Translation: We also made our way back to the dorm under the setting sun.

MESSAGE.EN: Masato tossed my cellphone to me as I came back from my bath.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato tossed my cellphone to me as I came back from my bath.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人、ひとの携帯投げないでよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, don't treat my phone like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, don't treat my phone like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「さっき何度かメール着いてたみたいだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You got a couple of emails.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You got a couple of emails.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: てて携帯を開くと、クドからのメールだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly opened my cell and found mails from Kud waiting.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly opened my cell and found mails from Kud waiting.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日はありがとうございました　ＫＮ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Thank you for today. -KN]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Thank you for today. -KN]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…真人、ちょっと出てくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Masato, I've got to go out for a little while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Masato, I've got to go out for a little while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それから、見回りのときごまかしてくれると…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So I hope you don't mind taking care of the patrol for me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So I hope you don't mind taking care of the patrol for me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「へいへい。代返のツケ、だいぶ溜まってるぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sure, sure. By the way, your debt for answering them for you keeps growing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sure, sure. By the way, your debt for answering them for you keeps growing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「でもま、いいや。早く行ってやれよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But what the hell. You hurry up and go to her now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But what the hell. You hurry up and go to her now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレが出来るのはこれぐらいだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝There's nothing I can do for you guys other than this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝There's nothing I can do for you guys other than this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありがと、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 下を歩きながら、メールを打つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I texted her back as I walked down the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: I texted her back as I walked down the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: ド、部室に来られるかな？
MESSAGE.EN: Kud, can you come over to the clubroom?
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud, can you come over to the clubroom?

MESSAGE.JP: ばらく経っても返信が来なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I waited for a while, but no reply arrived.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waited for a while, but no reply arrived.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも僕は家庭科部室へ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I headed for the clubroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I headed for the clubroom.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ぐっどいぶにんぐ、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Guddo ibuningu, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Guddo ibuningu, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 室の前で部屋着のクドが立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was standing in front of the room in her casual wear.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's okay... I'll wait somewhere else. Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's okay... I'll wait somewhere else. Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(There she is...)

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh, Riki. School is over? Thank you for coming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh, Riki. School is over? Thank you for coming.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you done packing? ...Is that the last package?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you done packing? ...Is that the last package?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうです。これを送ったら、おしまいです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. I send this and I'll be all done...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. I send this and I'll be all done...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とクドは歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud and I began to walk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud and I began to walk.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「なかなか、感慨深いものがありますね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This makes me relive many deep feelings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This makes me relive many deep feelings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「前もこうしてリキと歩きました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I walked along with you before just like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I walked along with you before just like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「同じような時刻でしたね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And it was around this hour, too...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And it was around this hour, too...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね、夕方だったな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, it was early in the evening like this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, it was early in the evening like this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でも、同じですけど、違います…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But still, it's a little bit different...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But still, it's a little bit different...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが押し黙る。

MESSAGE.Translation: Kud went silent.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…ぐすっ」

理樹@「クド…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝T-this is weird.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝T-this is weird.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「なんで、泣くかなぁ、私…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I can't believe I'm crying right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I can't believe I'm crying right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「昨日の夜も散々泣いたのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Even though I cried so much last night...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Even though I cried so much last night...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ぐすっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝*Hic*...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝*Hic*...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろぽろとクドの頬に涙が伝う。

MESSAGE.Translation: Tears were streaming down her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…荷物、持つよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Let me help you with that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Let me help you with that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はクドから段ボール箱を受け取ると持ち上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I took the cardboard box from her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よいしょっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Heave-ho.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Heave-ho.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は軽い。本当に小物しか入っていないのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: The box was very light; as she had said, there were only small items inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: The box was very light; as she had said, there were only small items inside.

MESSAGE.JP: 車場につくと、黒い車が停まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When we reached the parking lot, we saw a black car waiting.
MESSAGE.Translation: When we reached the parking lot, we saw a black car waiting.

MESSAGE.Translation: There were several men in suits standing beside it.

MESSAGE.Translation: They appeared to be from the Tevuan Embassy.

MESSAGE.Translation: The two dogs were also waiting by the car, wagging their tails.

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Strelka... Belka... Aren't you supposed to be working now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Strelka... Belka... Aren't you supposed to be working now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはしゃがみ込んで、ストレルカたちの首を抱いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud bent down and hugged both of them around the neck.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud bent down and hugged both of them around the neck.

MESSAGE.JP: はその間に、車のトランクに段ボールを入れた。

MESSAGE.Translation: In the meantime, I tucked the box in the trunk of the car.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「風紀委員のお仕事、頑張ってください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Keep up the good work in the disciplinary committee.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Keep up the good work in the disciplinary committee.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「学園にそのまま居られるように風紀委員のひとに頼んでおきました…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I asked them to let you two stay at the school...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I asked them to let you two stay at the school...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ン…
MESSAGE.EN: Woof...
MESSAGE.Translation: Woof...

MESSAGE.JP: トレルカが鼻を鳴らす。

MESSAGE.JP: ェルカはぐるぐるとクドの周りを回り、最後に、

MESSAGE.Translation: Belka spun around and around Kud and

MESSAGE.EN: Vow! gave a single bark at the end.
MESSAGE.Translation: Vow! gave a single bark at the end.

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm sorry, you two. Please forgive me for being selfish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm sorry, you two. Please forgive me for being selfish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 匹を引き寄せて、クドはぎゅぅ、と抱き込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud drew up the two dogs and hugged them tightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud drew up the two dogs and hugged them tightly.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうだ…リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I almost forgot... Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I almost forgot... Riki.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Would you do me a favor?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Would you do me a favor?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…何かな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure... what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure... what is it?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝There's still some stuff left in my room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝There's still some stuff left in my room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「時間がなくて…お手数ですが、捨てていただけませんか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I didn't have time to deal with it... so could you please throw them away for me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I didn't have time to deal with it... so could you please throw them away for me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それぐらいお安いご用だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure, that's a piece of cake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure, that's a piece of cake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「お手数お掛けして申し訳ありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm sorry to trouble you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm sorry to trouble you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を下げるクド。
MESSAGE.EN: She bowed to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bowed to me.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…それから…」
ドは顔を上げると少しためらいながら言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She lifted her face and spoke a little hesitantly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She lifted her face and spoke a little hesitantly.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「預かってもらえませんか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'd like you to keep something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'd like you to keep something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「コロリョフさんに倣って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝In the footsteps of Korolyov-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝In the footsteps of Korolyov-san.❞

MESSAGE.EN: She took off her hat and cut the button off with a small pen knife.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took off her hat and cut the button off with a small pen knife.

MESSAGE.JP: はクドからボタンを受け取った。
MESSAGE.EN: She then handed it over to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then handed it over to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki, thank you for everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki, thank you for everything.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...It's time to go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...It's time to go.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, already?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, already?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then I've got to bring everyone else here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then I've got to bring everyone else here...❞

MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head in silent denial.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head in silent denial.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I already gave my goodbyes... and I don't want to make the parting any harder.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I already gave my goodbyes... and I don't want to make the parting any harder.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そんな顔しないでください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Don't make a face like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Don't make a face like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「約束、守ることができるように…がんばりますから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm going to do everything I can... to keep our promise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm going to do everything I can... to keep our promise.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: That's right. That's the promise I've given her.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「よいしょっと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Here we go...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Here we go...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, what are those for?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They are for a Tevuan custom followed before setting off for a faraway place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ガガーリン少佐も出発するとき同じことをしたらしいのです」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Major Gagarin did the same thing when he set out.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The major's friend Leonov-san said so in a book.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ると落ち着きますからね、とクド。

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Here, have a seat, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Here, have a seat, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝O-okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝O-okay...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Well then, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: She stood up out of her chair.

MESSAGE.EN: I tried to think of something smart to say.

MESSAGE.JP: れど思いつかない。
MESSAGE.EN: But nothing came to mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: But nothing came to mind.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Can I ask you to cast a good-luck charm on me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Can I ask you to cast a good-luck charm on me?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S-sure! Of course I will. What am I supposed to do?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Say ❛ni puha ni pera.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Say ❛ni puha ni pera.❜❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ni puha... ni pera?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ni puha... ni pera?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, that's right. Ni puha ni pera.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, that's right. Ni puha ni pera.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どんな意味？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What does that mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What does that mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の質問にクドはひどく柔らかい笑みを見せて言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud responded to my question with a dreadfully tender smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud responded to my question with a dreadfully tender smile.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…幸運を祈ります、という意味ですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...❛I wish you luck.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...❛I wish you luck.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「すごく、外国っぽい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That does sound quite exotic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That does sound quite exotic.❞

MESSAGE.EN: Kud giggled at my comment.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud giggled at my comment.

MESSAGE.Translation: While her eyes filled with tears, she kept laughing.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Vse horosho, chto horosho konchayetsya...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This is just like the saying goes; all's well that ends well.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Bye-bye, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, bye-bye, Kud. I'll be waiting. I'm going to be waiting until you return.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Прощайте(Proschayte).❞
